Method Detail

format

public java.lang.String format(javax.swing.text.Document doc,
                               int offset,
                               java.lang.String text)
                        throws IllegalTextFormatException
format verifies the input text to be inserted into the JTextField component has a valid format and performs any other mutations on the text.
Parameters:
doc:Ljavax.swing.text.Document - object model of the JTextField using this schema, containing the content of the field.
offset - is an integer value specifying the offset into the document.
text:Ljava.lang.String - object containing the text to format and valid before inserting into the JTextField component.
Throws:
Ljjb.toolbox.swing.text.IllegalTextFormatException - if the text format is not valid input to the textfield component.
